title: Data Recovery & Encrypted Backup Solutions in {{city_upper}}, FL
headline: Recover lost files, or make sure you never lose them again.
description: Recover lost files and secure your data with encrypted backup systems. Local data recovery experts in {{city_upper}} for drives, USBs, and more.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Over 90 percent of people have no recent backup of their personal or business data.
Drives can fail suddenly due to age, firmware bugs, electrical damage, or overheating. SSDs often show no warning at all before failure.
Ransomware can lock your files instantly, but with a secure backup in place, recovery is quick and stress-free.

sections.heading: What We Do
paragraph: We recover lost data when your system fails and set up long-term backup strategies to prevent it from happening again. Our goal is to protect your files and give you peace of mind, whether you're an individual, family, or small business.
items: Recover deleted, corrupted, or inaccessible files from drives and USB devices
Identify hardware warning signs before complete failure occurs
Configure encrypted, automated backup systems that work in the background
Migrate files across computers, operating systems, or secure cloud platforms
Create backup strategies with both onsite and offsite protection
Use trusted tools that respect your privacy and keep you in control

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: We start with a no-risk assessment to determine if recovery is possible without sending your drive to a lab.
If your data can be accessed, we recover what we can using proven tools and validate the results with you.
Then we help set up a backup system that protects you going forward. No subscriptions. No recurring fees. Just secure access to your data when you need it.
